# lodash.debounce v4.0.8

The [lodash]( method `_.debounce` exported as a [Node.js]( module.

## Installation

Using npm:
```bash
$ {sudo -H} npm i -g npm
$ npm i --save lodash.debounce
```

In Node.js:
```js
var debounce = require('lodash.debounce');
```

See the [documentation]( or [package source]( for more details.
